title: When would you like to die?
body: I want to die at 30, that's when I feel like I have done everything I should have, living past 30 seems like a waste of time honestly.

I really don't get this, really

So many who play this game and want to die must be emotionally festering inside

For most people like this it's not so much that they want to die, rather they simply wish not to exist at all. Dying may seem to be the same as not existing but there is always the case of those who are left behind afterwards. It's like a tug of war between rationality and emotion in your head it goes on and on till one side wins, I wouldn't call it festering but it sure isn't a pleasant experience having all that going on inside.

Regardless of who it is the things they experience each day will have an affect on them, however small, of course for each person it depends on how seriously they take that segment of their life. I would say if one is in a state of mind like this steer away from things that cause you the most stress for a while if at all possible or learn how to take the stresses it may cause you less seriously. This of course doesn't get rid of the root issue, but it does make it easier to start working at it.

So if this game is one of the things that causes them a fair amount of stress they should indeed take a break from it for a while, and try to take a mental holiday from anything that would do them more harm than good.

Root issues come up when you are safe to express the innermost fear you have about it, which most people don't definitely.

Fortunately we live in an age where there are numerous people one can talk to anonymously about their issues and fears. I know first hand that even with anonymity opening up can be hard but just having someone listen without judging makes a world of difference, the push it provides people gets them standing on their own feet again ready to face their fears.

It's all up to that first step of talking to someone, a lot of people have difficulty taking that first step I think the best thing others can do is to take the first step for them and approach them first. Of course it can be difficult to convince them to talk, but if you go about it right and don't give up eventually they will.
